comments.body:
Are these the only valid options, in which case you should add
`choices: ['SG_TYPE_STRING', 'SG_TYPE_KEYVAL']
and similar in `argument_specs`

yes, these are the only valid options but if controller is upgraded to newer builds then using choices would be limiting if AVI api now supports more options but ansible module does not as it is older version. It would make modules use a bit more restrictive. I would propose we don't move it into the choices as it allows new enums to be used without upgrading the ansible modules.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +61,65 @@        description:
            - Type of stringgroup.
            - Enum options - SG_TYPE_STRING, SG_TYPE_KEYVAL.
            - Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as SG_TYPE_STRING.
        required: true
